data.eml:eml: A new species of Cyrtodactylus (Squamata: Gekkonidae) from the limestone forest of Khammouane Province, central Laos

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Luu, Vinh Quang, Calame, Thomas, Nguyen, Truong Quang, Bonkowski, Michael, Ziegler, Thomas (2015): A new species of Cyrtodactylus (Squamata: Gekkonidae) from the limestone forest of Khammouane Province, central Laos. Zootaxa 4058 (3): 388-402, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4058.3.6
